title: Hide admin dashboard link and enable access only via /admin URL

requirements.summary: Remove the admin dashboard navigation link from the HeaderNav component so it is not visible in the main navigation menu
acceptanceCriteria: The admin dashboard link is not visible in the HeaderNav component
Users cannot see or click an admin link from the main navigation
Admin functionality remains accessible through direct URL navigation

file_operations.description: Remove the admin dashboard link from the navigation menu. The link should be removed from both the desktop navigation links array and the mobile menu items array. Keep all other navigation links (hotel, cab, driver, store) intact. Do not modify the authentication controls or any other parts of the header.

requirements.summary: Ensure the admin dashboard remains fully accessible when users navigate directly to the /admin URL path
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /admin in the browser address bar loads the admin dashboard
The OwnerGuard authorization check still applies at the /admin route
Unauthorized users see the AccessDeniedScreen when accessing /admin
Authorized admins can access and use all admin dashboard functionality via /admin

file_operations.description: Verify that the /admin route is properly configured with the OwnerGuard wrapper and OwnerDashboardPage component. Ensure the route registration allows direct browser navigation to /admin. No changes should be needed if the route is already properly configured with OwnerGuard protection.
